publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-719.1 Joe FitzPatrick: Date for Removal of Forth Road Bridge Tolls—As an amendment to motion (S3M-719) in the name of Helen Eadie, leave out from "is mindful" to end and insert "notes that the people of Dundee are suffering from increased congestion; welcomes the fact that a Bill which aims to abolish tolls on the Forth and Tay bridges is being brought before the Parliament after only six months of an SNP Government, and further notes the actions of the previous administration which in eight years failed to improve the social and economic lives of our people by removing tolls from the Forth and Tay bridges." Supported by: Brian Adam*, Keith Brown*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Alex Neil*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-719.1 Joe FitzPatrick: Date for Removal of Forth Road Bridge Tolls—As an amendment to motion (S3M-719) in the name of Helen Eadie, leave out from "is mindful" to end and insert "notes that the people of Dundee are suffering from increased congestion; welcomes the fact that a Bill which aims to abolish tolls on the Forth and Tay bridges is being brought before the Parliament after only six months of an SNP Government, and further notes the actions of the previous administration which in eight years failed to improve the social and economic lives of our people by removing tolls from the Forth and Tay bridges." Supported by: Brian Adam, Keith Brown, Bob Doris, Bill Kidd, Alex Neil, Kenneth Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Sandra White, Alasdair Allan*, Rob Gibson*, Aileen Campbell*, Bashir Ahmad*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-719.1 Date for Removal of Forth Road Bridge Tolls (lodged on 1 November 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-719.1 Date for Removal of Forth Road Bridge Tolls (lodged on 1 November 2007) Nigel Don*
